snippet: New England Patriots star Tom Brady on Wednesday lost a bid to have a U.S. appeals court reconsider his four-game suspension, in what could be the quarterback's last chance to avoid punishment over the "Deflategate" scandal....
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots star Tom Brady on Wednesday lost a bid to have a U.S. appeals court reconsider his four-game suspension, in what could be the quarterback's last chance to avoid punishment over the "Deflategate" scandal.

headline.main: Brady Loses Deflategate Appeal, Suspension Stands
headline.print_headline: Brady Loses Deflategate Appeal, Suspension Stands
